version_description:
• The music player now has a brand new look. It's fast, stable and looks fresh and new. We've added smoother animations, the ability to swipe between playlists as well as share songs on both your wall and in a private message.
• We've updated our masks
Improvements and bug fixes

• A new screen for viewing live streams: instantly comment and subscribe to streamers, send stickers and gifts, watch interesting streams from provided suggestions.

• Support has never been closer as now you can get help using the mobile app's new

• Added support for mobile AMP so that you can read articles with ease with reduced data usage. Instantly download news items and pages of external sites that use this technology, such links are marked with a lightning badge.
• New document search. Qui
Improvements and bug fixes

• We've added the ability to report pages. Now you can submit complaints against pages that distribute spam or violate other rules. We review all reports immediately upon reception to ensure that VK is comfortable to use.

• You can now send VK invi

Improved notifications. Now, you can immediately respond to notifications within the app. For example, you can reply to a message or accept a friend request. If the notifications are viewed on the computer, they will disappear from your phone

Improved notifications. Now, you can immediately respond to notifications within the app. For example, you can reply to a message or accept a friend request. If the notifications are viewed on the computer, they will disappear from your phone
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

• Updated the Messages section inside and out. For example, chats now open on the first unread message and a user can delete their messages for everyone in a chat for 24 hours after sending them.

• Added a convenient way to get to VK from other app

• Updated the Messages section inside and out. For example, chats now open on the first unread message and a user can delete their messages for everyone in a chat for 24 hours after sending them.

• Added a convenient way to get to VK from other app
We're continuing to improve stability and increase the speed of our services.

• Edit messages
Did you make a clumsy typo? Don’t worry, everyone makes mistakes. Correct your misspellings and let others be none the wiser. If anyone in the chat edits their message, the word “edited” will appear next to it.

• Watch videos on

Bug fixes
We're continuing to improve stability and increase the speed of our services.

• Play games without downloading and installing
Thanks to the Direct Games platform, any game from the catalog can be played right in the app.

• Publish stories with 2 masks
Masks for everyone! Now you and your friends can try on masks togeth

• Mention friends in chats. Just type "@" in your message and select the person you need from the list of chat members. When you send your message, that person will receive an instant notification about it.

• Open specific messages right from chat

Polls 2.0 — Eye-catching and easy-to-use, with a bunch of new features.

• Add a colored background to make your poll unique and noticeable. Choose from the pictures offered or upload one yourself.

• Pin messages in chats.
Chat members will never miss important information such as useful links, meeting places and travel times.

• Send chat invite links.
Users who started a conversation can copy a unique chat invitation link in the chat i

• Share photos faster.
Send pics to your friends or post them on your community without tiring your fingers out. The "Share" button is right there when looking at your pictures.

Find out the most important information about a public page in a matter of seconds.
Updated the design of the screen containing the community’s main information and description.
Bug fixes

• Talk to your friends face to face
Now it’s even easier to switch to video calling while talking with your friends on VK. What’s more, thanks to newly added support for landscape orientation, you can now turn your phone whichever way you'd like during

• Talk to your friends face to face
Now it’s even easier to switch to video calling while talking with your friends on VK. What’s more, thanks to newly added support for landscape orientation, you can now turn your phone whichever way you'd like during

• Enjoy watching videos in the updated player
The video player is now more beautiful and easy to use. Fast-forward or rewind by double-tapping on the right or left sides of the screen, adjust the video speed and enable full-screen mode with one gesture

• Enjoy watching videos in the updated player
The video player is now more beautiful and easy to use. Fast-forward or rewind by double-tapping on the right or left sides of the screen, adjust the video speed and enable full-screen mode with one gesture

Bug fixes

• Meet the new Bookmarks
Save interesting posts, articles, videos and other content to check out later. You’ll be able to quickly find what you need in the new Bookmarks section. And with the help of tags, you’ll be easily able to group content togethe

• Switch to our stellar dark mode
Chat comfortably any time of the day with our stylish dark design reducing the stress on your eyes. Tap on “Appearance” in the app settings to switch between modes.

Browse your liked content easily
Use tabs to switch between different types of content in your “Liked” feed such as posts, comments, photos and videos.
Using bookmarks became even easier. Profiles and communities are now grouped into separate categories, which allows you to quickly find pages you’re looking for.

Easily free up space on your phone by using the new “Clear cache” function in Settings.

Photos from messages and the news feed are cached, which allows them to appear instantly. Sometimes, though, free space is what really matters.

We made the news feed smarter and the recommendations better.

• Share interesting content with one tap
Share photos, videos and much more by tapping the share icon and selecting which chats you want to send them to.

• Get a sneak peek of the chat with 3D Touch
Pressing on a chat name a bit harder than u

• Listen to voice messages in a new player
Now you can listen to messages and use other sections of the app at the same time. You can also adjust their playback speed, and if you received several messages, they’ll play automatically one after the other

QR codes make life so much easier. Within seconds, you can share links to interesting communities, profiles and content. These codes can be used anywhere. Show them to your friends or print them out for people to scan at events and places around town.

QR codes make life so much easier. Within seconds, you can share links to interesting communities, profiles and content. These codes can be used anywhere. Show them to your friends or print them out for people to scan at events and places around town.

We are getting the app ready for some important updates.

Fully immerse yourself in voice messages. Just open a chat, hold your phone up to your ear, and voice messages will start playing one after the other. If you haven’t listened to a message yet, there’ll be a blue dot by the play button to let you know.

Fully immerse yourself in voice messages. Just open a chat, hold your phone up to your ear, and voice messages will start playing one after the other. If you haven’t listened to a message yet, there’ll be a blue dot by the play button to let you know.

• Customize comment order
Newest, oldest or most interesting — if a post has more than 10 comments, you can choose how you want to see them.

• Listen to voice messages offline

Are you someone who likes to send long voice messages? Then if you don’t want to hold the microphone button the whole time, you can just slide it up to the lock icon to record hands-free.

• We made it possible to search for chat members and messages right in your chats. This feature works even if you have a slow internet connection.
• We updated our QR code scanner. Now it can recognize QR codes in photos that you have on your device. Y

• We made it possible to search for chat members and messages right in your chats. This feature works even if you have a slow internet connection.
• We updated our QR code scanner. Now it can recognize QR codes in photos that you have on your device. Y

Do you ever find multiple QR codes right next to each other? Now you don’t have to bring your phone closer or adjust your camera’s focus to scan one of them. Just open your QR Scanner in the app camera and tap the code you want after it’s detected.

Do you ever find multiple QR codes right next to each other? Now you don’t have to bring your phone closer or adjust your camera’s focus to scan one of them. Just open your QR Scanner in the app camera and tap the code you want after it’s detected.
Newly added chat members can now see the last 250 messages sent. Just allow access to the message history when adding them to the chat.

You can now make photo collages in stories and reply to friends’ stories instantly with stickers.

• Add stickers to your favorites
Tired of constantly scrolling to find that one sticker you always use? Tap and hold it to open a menu where you can save the sticker to your favorites.

Now you can live stream in landscape mode. Just rotate your phone and start streaming.

Now you can create clickable links to more than just people and communities in your posts. Add links to mini apps, videos, photos or other VK content using @ or *. For example, “Check out @vk.com/wall-22822305_1013720 (this post)”.

On iOS 13, you no longer have to tap and hold messages to select them. Now you can select several messages in one go by swiping up or down with two fingers.
On iOS 13, you no longer have to tap and hold messages to select them. Now you can select several messages in one go by swiping up or down with two fingers.

The menu that opens when you tap and hold messages on iOS 13 has new options! Now you can quickly forward or report messages as well as privately reply to ones sent in group chats.

The Messages section is now Messenger. This new name more accurately reflects the service’s features, as it’s not only used to send messages but make calls, transfer money and share music, photos, videos and documents as well.

We introduced two updates to the messenger:

• Smart unread message counter
You can now set the unread message counter to only show the number of unread messages from chats with notifications enabled. You can do this in your settings: Settings →
We got rid of a bunch of bugs that you reported.

Notifications about people leaving old chats won’t bother you anymore. An automatic message will still appear in the chat when someone leaves, but the number of unread messages won’t increase, and the chat won’t move up in your chat list. This applies to

Now you can edit voice messages. Did background noise mess up the transcription? It’s easy to fix! Just open the transcription, press and hold it to open the menu and select Edit text. You can edit the transcription within 24 hours of sending the voice me

Now you’ll be able to see if someone is trying to send you a photo or video, just like with text and voice messages. There will no longer be any awkward silences while files are uploading.
